fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Fire tears at a player within range, attacking them
-(Familiar) Fire a tear at someone, making any protective abilities fail

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If Isaac spawns, they will ALWAYS be the first lead
-In your familiar form, you have no defense
Damage: 1 (Basic)
Range: 5
Luck: 0%

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who try to stop you
